channel.title: Database on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Database on Arrans github.io

item.title: supabase/supabase
item.description: The Postgres development platform. Supabase gives you a dedicated Postgres database to build your web, mobile, and AI applications.

item.description: Database migrations. CLI and Golang library.

item.description: Manifest gives you a complete backend with data, storage, logic and an admin UI so you can ship your prototypes, MVPs and simple web apps fast. 🦚

item.description: ✨ The Next Gen Airtable Alternative: No-Code Postgres

item.description: Neon: Serverless Postgres. We separated storage and compute to offer autoscaling, code-like database branching, and scale to zero.
